     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Death and Desire: Tibetan Buddhism &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>

      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17078099">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078099">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078099">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078099">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://bit.ly/spring2015student">
            A.T.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078099" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078100">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078100">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078100">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078100">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078100" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17078101">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078101">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078101">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How can I narrow my topic and identify seminal scholarly works?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078101">
          <div id="boxatt17078101" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130183">
              <a id="link_20130183" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;res_id=info%3Asid%2Fgale%3AGVRL&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi%2Ffmt:kev:mtx:journal&amp;rft.isbn=9780028659107&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:oclc.org:mul_coll" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130183,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Death and Desire: Tibetan Buddhism', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13331149}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Buddhism
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Entries written by leading scholars in the field.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078102">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078102">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078102">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate scholarly books on my topic?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078102">
          <div id="boxatt17078102" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25191633">
              <a id="link_25191633" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25191633,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Death and Desire: Tibetan Buddhism', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130186">
              <a id="link_20130186" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130186,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Death and Desire: Tibetan Buddhism', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Portions or full text are available for some books. Use WorldCat to acquire the full text of recent scholarly texts where only snippets are available online.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078103">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078103">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078103">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate scholarly articles (chapters or journal articles) on my topic?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078103">
          <div id="boxatt17078103" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130187">
              <a id="link_20130187" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130187,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Death and Desire: Tibetan Buddhism', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Limit to "peer reviewed" or "academic journals" to get at the scholarly journals.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130190">
              <a id="link_20130190" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=reh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130190,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Death and Desire: Tibetan Buddhism', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12465744}); ">
               ATLA Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Specific to religion studies. Use caution here: not all sources included here are scholarly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130189">
              <a id="link_20130189" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130189,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Death and Desire: Tibetan Buddhism', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855349}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free resource. Some full text may be available, especially when searching from campus where library-subscribed full text is often linked directly to Google Scholar.  The surest way to verify all points of Muhlenberg access to any full text is to run a journal title search in the library catalog for the article in question.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130188">
              <a id="link_20130188" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130188,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Death and Desire: Tibetan Buddhism', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Archive from Stanford University of scholarly journals in all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078104">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078104">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078104">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           What about popular sources?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078104">
          <div id="boxatt17078104" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130191">
              <a id="link_20130191" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130191,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Death and Desire: Tibetan Buddhism', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016760}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4642485" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17078105">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078105">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078105">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources and compiling an annotated bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078105">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           Or visit the
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/717/01/">
            <em>
             Online Writing Lab
            </em>
           </a>
           at Purdue.
          </p>
          <p>
           The full text of the Chicago Manual of Style, 16th ed. is available to Muhlenberg College students
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=Http://www.chicagomanualofstyle.org/16/contents.html">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           . Here is a
           <a href="https://www.zotero.org/support/">
            user guide
           </a>
           to Zotero. NOTE: In order to construct footnotes (as opposed to bibliography), the
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/support/word_processor_plugin_installation_for_zotero_2.1">
            MS Word Plug-In
           </a>
           is needed.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078105" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078106">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078106">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078106">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078106">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078106" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div id="footer">
     <div id="footer_topline">

      </a>

     </div>
